name: HighStakes
description:
Disclamer 

this isnt a finish game, its pretty hard developing a game with a story alone without some fresh eyes to criteque it.  the famicase design isnt mine, its the prompt i used for the game-jam this game was made for.

Plot

Darkness has fallen, An eternal night. The supernatural emerge from the shadows.

As body's start to be found in the depths of alleyways and back streets, 
Dracula, vampire Lord and commander of the army of chaos, infiltrates society.
Tasting the blood of those who wander to far from the light, turning them into vampires.
Vegas with all its neonlights becomes a beacon of life for the human population, 
providing a sense of security to all those who now live there.
Months pass and more and more people are becoming vampires. 
The government, or what's left of it, 
issues mandatory weekly blood donations in order to try quench the thirst of those vampires that are still as civil as normal humans. 
Our protagonist and playable character, 
a news reporter technician who has been keeping the lights on,
telecommunications up, and broadcasts the radio order to communicate with the rest of the world;
from local news studio is delivered some really bad news;
his daughter was drained by a vampire. 
Devastated by the sudden and tragic loss of his daughter,
he vows to get revenge on Dracula and try bring light back to the void of darkness beyond the neon lights. 
A local group of scientists are studying a vampire, 
one of their co-workers who was previously bitten by a vampire acts as both a test subject and scientist. 
Our player character comes across this groop, 
recruited by the anti-vampire organization, because of his close connection to a vampire drained victim. 
He is urged to infiltrate the ranks of a known vampire gathering location and collect valuable information,
infomation that could lead to understanding the cause of the eternal darkness and try eliminate the cause of it,
as well as get revenge on the rogue vampires doing the drainings. 
We visit different locations navigating our way through the neon lit streets, 
starting from the players home acting as a hub, the scientists lab acting as an quest giver, 
then the club, as well as the news studio broadcasting their findings to the world.
